field.name: emundusattachmentpublic_articleid
field.label: PLG_FABRIK_FORM_EMUNDUSATTACHMENTPUBLIC_ARTICLE_UPLOADED
field.query: SELECT id, title AS label FROM #__content WHERE state != -2

field.name: emundusattachmentpublic_articleid_already_uploaded
field.label: PLG_FABRIK_FORM_EMUNDUSATTACHMENTPUBLIC_ARTICLE_ALREADY_UPLOADED
field.query: SELECT id, title AS label FROM #__content WHERE state != -2
